Package gw.webservice

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FindIdsResult
    Deprecated interface. This class was used by the IDataObjectAPI to return object Ids.
    IDataObjectAPI
    Deprecated interface. There is no replacement. Instead, you should write your own Gosu class and publish it as a web service by marking it with the @RpcWebService annotation.

    Methods in this class use XPath. The notation draws heavily from the new "Service Data Object" spec from BEA and IBM. See their Service Data Ojbects specification. Please note that certain characters need to be escaped in XPath notation. Specifically: ' goes to '
    " goes to &qout;
    < goes to <
    > goes to >
    & goes to &
    @author mshaw @version Jan 16, 2004 4:15:21 PM
    IGroupAPI
    IGroupAPI provides mechanisms for adding new Groups to and obtaining information for existing Groups from ClaimCenter
    IProfilerAPI
    API to access services offered by the Guidewire Profiler.
    ITypelistToolsAPI
    ITypelistToolsAPI provides methods that allow for the extraction of typelist data from the system.
    IUserAPI
    UserAPI is used to perform operations on users. This includes creating and modifying.
    IZoneImportAPI
    IZoneImportAPI is a remote interface to a set of tools to import zone data (in csv format) into the staging tables. See documentation for the zone data csv format.
    InsertPathValue
    Represents the location and type of an entity to insert. Used in conjunction with IDataObjectAPI.setPathValues(String,String,InsertPathValue[],PathValue[],String[]).
    PathValue
    Represents the path and value to update.

    Used in conjunction with IDataObjectAPI.setPathValues(String, String, InsertPathValue[], PathValue[], String[]).
    SetPathValuesIDRef
    SetPathValuesResult
    WsdlConfigTestUtil
    Provides functionality to create new configs pre-populated with a username and password, for use by any web-service API.
